title:
What are the laws in New Hanover county for dumping trash on your own property? 



Can a homeowner be fined if the trash is not on there property? 



There is a home at the end of Kings Castle Lane in Castle Hayne, NC that has been dumping trash for years and it is spreading on to neighboring properties.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=18
